latlong.description: The lat/lon of the aircraft at the time.

loc.description: The location of the aircraft at the time.

place.description: The place that the lat/lon geocodes to.

accuracy.description: The horizontal accuracy of the latlong sample.

altitude.description: The altitude of the aircraft at the time.

altitude:accuracy.description: The vertical accuracy of the altitude measurement.

time.description: The time the telemetry sample was taken.
